 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָלָה‎</span>] **verb** ==roast flesh== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְלֶה צָלִי‎</span> [[Isa.44.16|Isa 44:16]] ***he roasteth a roast***; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצְלֶה בָשָׂר‎</span> v[[Isa.44.19|Isa 44:19]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְלוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.2.15|1Sam 2:15]] give flesh (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּשָׂר‎</span>) ***to roast.***
